scripts.dev: concurrently --names "SERVER,CLIENT" --kill-others-on-fail "npm run start --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=server && npm run build --workspace=client
scripts.test: npm run test:server || true && npm run test:client || true
scripts.coverage: npm run test && npm run coverage:prepare && npm run coverage:collect && npm run coverage:report
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server && npm install
